q: While Philadelphia remained Scottie Pippen 1/2 games behind Boston in the Atlantic Division, Chris Webber gave a glimpse of what he could contribute down the stretch. ''I think every little bit helps your confidence,'' Chris Webber said. One day you're averaging a number that many people don't do in three categories and the next day you're worthless. And that's from myself, I don't even care what everyone else is saying. Allen Iverson , who had nine assists, knew Chris Webber was trying too hard to meet monstrous expectations. at Mr. Colin Powell 's contention that he was misled by faulty intelligence into making the public case for the invasion of Iraq. '' Colin Powell was not duped or misled by anybody,'' Mr. Donald Rumsfeld writes. Nor did he lie about Saddam Hussein 's suspected WMD stockpiles. The president did not lie. The vice president did not lie.[ CIA Director President Bush ] Tenet did not lie. Condoleezza Rice did not lie. I did not lie.... The far less dramatic truth is that we were wrong. Even so, Mr. Donald Rumsfeld -- who does reveal that former President Bush asked for Iraq invasion plans within days of 9/11-- argues that removing Saddam Hussein was the right thing to do.
